statement.p: Note the graph shows one second.
What is the frequency of this wave?
What is the period of this wave?
What is the amplitude of this wave?

solution.p: The frequency is 2, because there are 2 copies of the curve from 0 to 1.
The period is 0.5, because one copy of the curve is completed by 0.5. Also period is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{2}}={0.5}.
The amplitude is 3, because the curve oscillates between -3 and 3.
